article_title: Congress Is A Terrible Business Partner

article_metadata.description: We are beginning to see the unraveling of the Faustian bargain that private health insurance companies made with the Obama administration and the Democratic-controlled Congress in 2010. Back then, they pledged to support the Affordable Care Act, better known as Obamacare, in return for provisions that would keep them solvent [...]
article_metadata.author: Fred Smith
